senses.sense_definition: The name of various cities, towns, and communities in the United States, often named after the Battle of Marengo.

examples.text: We stopped in <w>Marengo</w> to refuel during our road trip across the state.
The historical society in <w>Marengo</w> preserves the town's local heritage.
Mr. <w>Marengo</w> has been managing the family business for over thirty years.
I have an appointment with Dr. <w>Marengo</w> at the clinic tomorrow.

senses.sense_definition: A dish consisting of chicken saut√©ed in oil with tomatoes and garlic, traditionally associated with Napoleon's victory at the Battle of Marengo.

examples.text: The chef prepared a classic <w>Marengo</w> using fresh herbs and tomatoes.
She decided to order the chicken <w>Marengo</w> because she loved historical recipes.
